#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
    ll i,val=1,k=2,t,n,ans,diff;
    set<ll> s;
    s.insert(1);
    for(i=1;i<61;i++)
    {
        val=val*k;
        s.insert(val);
    }
    set<ll>::iterator it;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        if(n&(n-1))
        {
            it=s.lower_bound(n);
            it--;
            diff=n-(*it);
                ans=2*(diff)+1;
            printf("%lld\n",ans);
        }
        else
            printf("1\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
